Rattrap "i'm about 5 minutes from our base. i need some help because we need to get these two pods back to the base because they are malfunctioing and i can only bring one back." 

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Windlord::

Windlord sent a secret com link to Rodimus "She's on way" He opened 
com link to Kup "After she's safe, we might need you back, lad, just 
wait my com link" after that he opened com link with Rattrap and 
Ydrassil "Y drassil, where are you???" after that he opened com link 
with Rattrap`"I'm free now, Rattrap, I can give you a hand, where 
can I find you?"
